titles.title: To limit United States assistance to Egypt unless Egypt is honoring its commitments under the 1979 peace treaty between Egypt and Israel.
To limit United States assistance to Egypt unless Egypt is honoring its commitments under the 1979 peace treaty between Egypt and Israel.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Middle East and South Asia .

committee.name: House Foreign Affairs
committee.subcommittee: Middle East, North Africa, and Central Asia

bill.summary: Prohibits the obligation or expenditure of funds for assistance to Egypt unless the President certifies to Congress that Egypt is honoring its commitments under the 1979 Egypt-Israel peace treaty.
